front.title: •No Escape
front.gametext: Deploy on table. You may immediately take top card of Lost Pile into hand. Effects, Epic Events, and Objectives are immune to Honor Of The Jedi. At each opponent's <> site, your characters and vehicles are each deploy -3 and your Force generation is +1. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Jabba's influence is not easily ignored. Neither are his voracious and vile appetites. Even Jedi soon learn this lesson.

pulls: Top card of Lost Pile into hand
